cast.overview: In a city where fire, water, land and air residents live together, a fiery young woman and a go-with-the-flow guy will discover something elemental: how much they have in common.
cast.title: Elemental

cast.overview: Chris Nielsen dies to find himself in a heaven more amazing than he could have ever dreamed of. There is one thing missing: his wife. After he dies, his wife Annie killed herself and went to hell. Chris decides to risk eternity in Hades for the small chance that he will be able to bring her back to heaven.
cast.title: What Dreams May Come

cast.overview: Despite his family’s baffling generations-old ban on music, Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician like his idol, Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his talent, Miguel finds himself in the stunning and colorful Land of the Dead following a mysterious chain of events. Along the way, he meets charming trickster Hector, and together, they set off on an extraordinary journey to unlock the real story behind Miguel's family history.
cast.title: Coco

details.biography: Wilma Bonet is an American actress known for her roles in 8mm (1999), What Dreams May Come (1998), and Jack (1996). She is also active as a theater performer and advocates for the representation of Latina actresses in the theater industry. Bonet lives in Oakland, California, and has collaborated with various theater groups, including the San Francisco Mime Troupe, El Teatro Campesino, and the Berkeley Repertory Theatre.
details.name: Wilma Bonet
